metadata.title: Tuesday, 15th October, 2013
metadata.session: THIRD SESSION OF THE ELEVENTH ASSEMBLY

parts: (a)    under which authority the Technical Committee on Drafting the Zambian Constitution was appointed; and
(b)    whether on completion of their work, the Technical Committee will, simultaneously, submit the Draft Constitution to the Republican President and members of the public.

questions.minister: Minister of Mines, Energy and Water Development
parts: (a)    what measures the Government has taken to improve the supply of electricity in Luapula Province;
(b)    what the total cost of improving the supply is; and
(c)    when the project will be completed.

questions.minister: Minister of Mines, Energy and Water Development
parts: (a)    when the development of the Kasanjiku Mini-Hydropower Station project in North-Western Province will commence;
(b)    who the promoters of the project are; and
(c)    what the total cost of the project is.

questions.minister: Minister of Education, Science, Vocational Training and Early Education
parts: (a)    how many retirees at the University of Zambia had not been paid their terminal benefits as of August, 2013;
(b)    how many retirees were still occupying institutional houses due to non-payment of their terminal benefits;
(c)    how much money, in total, was owed to all the retirees as of August, 2013;
(d)    what measures have been taken to pay off all the retirees; and
(e)    when the Institution will be up to date in paying retirees their terminal benefits.

questions.minister: Minister of Transport, Works, Supply and Communication
parts: (a)    when the Government will grade the Mungulube road which is the main link of Milenge District from the Western to the Eastern part of the Boma;
(b)    whether the Government has any plans of linking Milenge Boma to other parts of the District without passing through Mansa; and
(c)    if so, when such plans will be implemented.

questions.minister: Minister of Education, Science, Vocational Training and Early Education
parts: (a)    whether the construction of the Milenge Trades Training Institute is on schedule;
(b)    if not, what measures the Government has taken to expedite the construction;
(c)    when the Institute is expected to be opened; and
(d)    what the estimated cost of constructing the Institute is.

questions.minister: Minister of Local Government and Housing
parts: (a)    how many districts were created from September, 2011 to August, 2013, Province by Province; and
(b)    whether the Government has carried out feasibility studies to ascertain the infrastructural needs and services required for the newly created districts.

questions.minister: Minister of Justice when Shimumbi Local Court in Senior Chief Shimumbi’s area in Lubansenshi Parliamentary Constituency will be rehabilitated.
Minister of Education, Science, Vocational Training and Early Education
parts: (a)    when infrastructure at Kaoma Secondary School, including teachers’ houses, will be rehabilitated;
(b)    when the sewer line at the School will be improved;
(c)    when the School will be provided with desks, beds and mattresses; and
(d)    when the roof of the School laboratory will be repaired.

questions.minister: Minister of Health when the Government will supply beddings to the following Rural Health Centres
parts: (a)    Nkeyema;
(b)    Njonjolo;
(c)    Shimano;
(d)    Namilangi;
(e)    Chitwa;
(f)    Kalumwange; and
(g)    Lunyati. ORDER OF THE DAY 1    Suppl y - Motion (11th October) - Resumption of Debate.
